class.name: JacobIK3D
class.brief_description: Pseudo inverse Jacobian matrix based inverse kinematics solver.
class.description: [JacobIK3D] calculates rotations for all joints simultaneously, producing natural and smooth movements. It is particularly suited for realistic animations, such as humans or biological creatures. [b]Note:[/b] It converges more slowly than other IK solvers, leading to gentler and less immediate tracking of targets.
